Hello there!
This is my second cinematic!, its still on WIP but i want to know if people like it.

This is a clip(intro) from the cinematic.
the cinematic will be finish on saturday, uploaded on sunday.
Probably because there isn't that much to reply to, but when it's finished It will have a big reply.

I can only hope this will be amazing when it is finished...

Wait...

Hope? I dont need to hope! I know it will be amazing!

Kewl.

The only thing I would suggest is to have the "Kenolax Studios Presents" tag pop in after the sunrise was completed in the first shot. This may or may not fit with what you're going for, as I am currently unable to listen to the audio b/c I am at work.
I was irritated that it ended! I like it!

uploaded on sunday.

But, But... It's sunday! Where's the video? Darn me and my lack of patience!

@G4S3FR you must be in japan, its saturday morning here.

@keanukeno21 nice clip, i liked the intro.

2 Errors I noticed, but other then that its awesome.

Error 1: Presents, not Present.

Error 2: The music is by h8_seed, not Woodentoaster. Wooden does do some of the lyrics though.
sorry guys, i delay the cinematic, idk when will it be finished though
